statements.select:
SELECT T1.OBJID ,T2.USER_NAME ,T2.REAL_NAME ,T1.USER_IP ,T3.SHOW_NAME AS PAGE_ID ,T4.METHOD_NAME AS METHOD_ID ,T1.METHOD_RESULT ,T1.RECORD_TIME ,T1.REMARK FROM SSL_WEB_LOG T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSP_PAGE_MENU T3 ON T1.PAGE_ID = T3.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSP_PAGE_METHOD T4 ON T1.METHOD_ID = T4.OBJID
T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
T2.USER_NAME like '%'||#where.USER_NAME#||'%'
T1.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG#
T1.RECORD_TIME >= #where.START_TIME#
T1.RECORD_TIME <= #where.END_TIME#
ORDER BY $OrderString$
